data.comment: Hannes Van Der Bruggen (Kortrijk) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 44, At Staaien, Seung-Woo Lee has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half is underway in Sint- Truiden.
In the minute 68, Kevin Muscat (St. Truidense) is making a first substitution, with Facundo Colidio replacing Seung-Woo Lee.
At Staaien, Faiz Selemani is shown a red card and sent off.
Samuel Asamoah (St. Truidense) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Oleksandr Filippov with Duckens Nazon.
Yves Vanderhaeghe is making the team's first substitution at Staaien with Gilles Dewaele replacing Hannes Van Der Bruggen.
The away team have replaced Ilombe Mboyo with Habib Gueye. This is the second substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
Bert Put blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Christophe Lepoint is replacing Michiel Jonckheere for Kortrijk at Staaien.
Petar Golubovic is booked for the away team.
Duckens Nazon (St. Truidense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
